meanings.definition: The quality or state of being an expert.
meanings.sent1: Her expertism in painting was evident from the intricate details in her artwork.
meanings.sent2: His expertism in carpentry allowed him to build a sturdy and beautiful bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lack of expertism in cooking, he attempted to make a gourmet meal for his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her expertism in gardening bloomed like a colorful garden in spring.
meanings.sent5: The expertism of the detective solved the mystery in record time.

meanings.definition: The knowledge or skill of an expert.
meanings.sent1: The professor's expertism in physics made the complex topic easy to understand.
meanings.sent2: She gained expertism in photography after years of practice and learning.
meanings.sent3: His expertism in chess was so great that he could play blindfolded against multiple opponents.
meanings.sent4: The expertism of the surgeon's hands saved many lives in the operating room.
meanings.sent5: With expertism in negotiation, she always got the best deals for her clients.
